short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable cosmos Deploy to live buttons

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever pressed a button on a web page you shouldn't have? You are clicking on harmless buttons and BAM! you mistakenly deploy to live non tested code, just because that "Deploy to live" button looks exactly like any other button in the page.

This extension allows you disable buttons on specified pages and to safely re-enable them when actually needed via the extension popup.
